properties.areaDesc: S of Oregon Inlet NC to Cape Hatteras NC out to 20 nm; S of Cape Hatteras NC to Ocracoke Inlet NC out to 20 nm
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 19 at 11:03AM EST until January 23 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Newport/Morehead City NC
properties.description:
* WHAT...West winds 20 to 25 kt with gusts up to 30 kt becoming
northwest, and seas 6 to 10 ft.

* WHERE...The coastal waters from Oregon Inlet to Ocracoke Inlet.

* WHEN...Until 7 PM EST Thursday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THURSDAY... ...GALE WARNING HAS EXPIRED
